    • Uses of EntityViewFactory in com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views

      Subinterfaces of EntityViewFactory in com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  DispatchingEntityViewFactory
      Extension of the default EntityViewFactory interface for implementations that support an EntityViewProcessorRegistry.
      Classes in com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views that implement EntityViewFactory 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultEntityViewFactory
      Base implementation for a EntityViewFactory that supports ViewElement rendering, and dispatches its logic to EntityViewProcessor instances that have more fine-grained hooks for interacting with the view rendering.
      Methods in com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views that return types with arguments of type EntityViewFactory 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static BiPredicate<EntityViewFactory,EntityViewContext> EntityViewFactoryAttributes.defaultAccessValidator()
      Returns a default access validator implementation that checks if there is an AllowableAction attribute on the EntityViewFactory and expects the action to be present in the EntityViewContext.getAllowableActions().
